code: @Test public void testExistsOrWaitsWhenNodeExists() throws Exception {     String node = "/cogito".     client.create(node, "ergo sum").     AnyOfOperations operation = getExistsOrWaitOperation(node).     assertEquals(node, operation.get().getResult()). }

@Test public void testExistsOrWaitsWhenNodeDoesNotExist() throws Exception {     String node = "/chapter-one".     AnyOfOperations operation = getExistsOrWaitOperation(node).     Thread.sleep(1000).     client.create(node, "I am born").     assertEquals(node, operation.get().getResult()). }

private AnyOfOperations getExistsOrWaitOperation(String node) {     ZooKeeper connection = getConnection().     AnyOfOperations operation = new AnyOfOperations(node, new ExistsOperation(connection, node), new ExistenceChangedOperation(connection, node)).     return operation. }
